Lu Dat Diu 
Curriculum Vitae 
PERSONAL INFORMATION 
LU DAT DIU 
  No.201, Block B, Vinh Vien Street, District 11, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam 
    (+84) 90 9747857 
   eric_lu520@yahoo.com 
Date of birth: 5th July 1991 
             WORK EXPERIENCE 
Feb 2019 – Present 
Sales and Visual Merchandiser 
Dsquared 2 - Saigon Centre, District 1, HCMC 
- 
Comprehensive understanding the background of the brand. 
- 
Answer customer’s questions about the products. 
- 
Worked closely with customers and promoted the sales.  
- 
Maintaining relationships with existing suppliers while seeking new ones 
- 
Getting feedback from customers. 
- 
Reacting to any changes in customer demand. 
- 
Scan customers' items, collect their money, distribute receipts and change, bag the customer's groceries. 
- 
Maintain the cash drawer at an appropriate level of bills. 
- 
Ensuring the products are delivered on time 
- 
Create appealing and eye-catching visual displays that lead the customer through the entire store 
- 
Produce window displays, signs, interior displays, floor plans and special promotions displays. 
- 
Identify key messages and set a clear image of the end result. 
- 
Come up with, revise and present design ideas with assistant merchandisers. 
- 
Oversee the production and brief staff on arranging displays. 
- 
Change displays to promote new product launches and reflect festive or seasonal themes. 
- 
Liaise with suppliers and source elements. 
Jan 2015 – Feb 2019 
Member Services Supervisor 
California Fitness & Yoga Centers (Viet Nam) – Bien Hoa City, Dong Nai Province 
- 
Manage high level of customer satisfaction by ensuring their needs and requests. 
- 
Organize efficient work schedules and meetings with own team for updates and functional training on a consistent 
basis. 
- 
Ensure marketing promotions from head office are well set up following marketing guideline. 
- 
Cooperate with marketing and PR to promote and publicize event. 
- 
Research market, identify event opportunities and generate interest. 
- 
Manage, train, audit staffs and system to ensure 100% POS accuracy. 
- 
Manage and report all payment methods and discrepancies. 
- 
Ensure agreement policies and procedures are adhered to at all times, report missing agreements to relevant 
departments. 
- 
Drive customer service training and procedures, audit on a consistent basis. 
- 
Achieve Club efficiencies by proposing policy and procedural improvement. 
- 
Ensure procedures and systems are practiced within the scope/requirement of the company. 
- 
Assist to recruit, hire, counsel, supervise and motivate development and discipline of staff. 
- 
Achieve minimal staffing targets and staff retention while maximizing productivity. 
- 
Propose and contribute ideas to staff development program at all times. 
- 
Ensure team has active involvement in Daily Staff Line-up program. 
Lu Dat Diu 
Curriculum Vitae 
- 
Maintain a 5 star standard facilities through auditing, feedback and reporting. 
- 
Ensure Daily Club Audits are conducted and filed accordingly. 
- 
Direct and train in-house and vendor supplied cleaners. 
- 
Ensure maintenance checks are conducted and issues handled in a timely manner. 
- 
Ensure safely of staff and members are in order at all times – train and prepare for incidents, injuries. 
- 
Conduct and report stock take of supplies and products. 
- 
Other jobs assigned by direct Member Services Manager. 
Nov 2012 – Jan 2015                      Front Desk Representative 
California Fitness & Yoga Centers (Viet Nam) – Hung Vuong Plaza, District 5 
- 
Welcome all guests and visitors and direct inquiries to appropriate staff. 
- 
Answer phones and emails; refer messages and inquires; mail distribution. 
- 
Provide information and direction to all guests and members. 
- 
Check-in members for classes, process payments; resolve payment issues or refer to supervisor; update and 
maintain records; close out and records cash drawer at end of shift. 
- 
Maintain orderly and clean classroom, gym, bathrooms and other public facilities.  
- 
Presentation and sale of retail items and promotion of classes, membership and special offers. 
- 
Support the staff and teachers/trainers with various administrative tasks and projects. 
- 
Maintain safe and clean reception area by complying with procedures, rules and regulations. 
- 
Maintain continuity among work teams by documentation and communicating actions, irregularities and continuing 
needs.  
- 
Open and close institute facility according to checklist items. 
EDUCATION AND TRAINING 
2008 
High School Diploma 
      Nam Ky Khoi Nghia High School, Ho Chi Minh City (Vietnam) 
           PERSONAL SKILLS 
First language: 
Cantonese, Vietnamese 
                           Other language(s) 
English, Mandarin 
                     Teamwork skills                  Good teamwork skill gained through my experience as a supervisor in Member 
Service Supervisor satisfaction and upholds the highly standard services to all 
Team Members. 
Computer skills 
  Good command of MS office (word, excel, power point) and internet (emails, etc.) 
Other skills 
 Good organizational and customer service management. 
ACHIEVEMENT AND AWARD 
California Fitness & Yoga Centers (Vietnam)   Awarded the Best Staff of The Month for all HCMC – December 2014 
REFERENCE 
- Mr. Kai Nguyen 
Area Member Services Manager 
(+84) 902 852801 
kainguyen@cfyc.com.vn 
- Mr. Jerry Tran 
Member Services Manager

jerrytran@cfyc.com.vn
